channel.title: Timers?
channel.description: I'm making a type of c wars, it is coming along good, except one thing. I have a timer set so every like 10 minutes the people are taken into the game, but everyone's timer is different. The timer is in public boolean process so it is being called every 500 ms, but the timer doesn't start for each person until they log in. If my timer is like at 500 and someone just logs in their's starts at 999 and we don't get into c wars at same time. How do i make the timer's so it is just one timer, not everyone has their own timer. All help is greatly appreciated.

item.title: Timers?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Or put it in the while loop in the server class, not client.

Read full topic

item.title: Timers?

If my timer is like at 500 and someone just logs in their’s starts at 999 and we don’t get into c wars at same time. How do i make the timer’s so it is just one timer, not everyone has their own timer. All help is greatly appreciated.
